post.author: 이석준
post.content:
Sean,
Metex Inc. is currently looking to fill a full time Java position that is currently available. Attached you will find the job description for you to view. Please feel free to browse our company website at http://www.metex.com/ for further information.
If you are interested in the position outlined, please email me back so we can explore the next steps.
Best Regards,
Linda Dai
Metex Inc.
416-203-8388
Please see the attached file for detail.
post.title: Java Developer Position
